Text:
Just what the hell codec is needed to play this?
WMP10, MPC, VLC -- none of them will play this and Video Inspector says it's an invalid file as well. If I can play it -- I will seed it. Right now it's just a candidate for the delete button.

#1, if you search for the kazaa codec pak on bit torrent and download it and install it, it will solve most of your "will not play" issues.  it includes the wmp classic and several other items which just about resolve all viewing issues.  hope this helps

K-Lite Mega Codec Pack 1.53
[34.0 MB], its installed and I still get those cant play it alerts?

Did you try with VLC?

www.videolan.org/vlc/

It's a player that don't use codecs and have everything built-in. It use to play most stuff.
